# MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle

**Enumeration**

Values that describe the degree of disambiguation context to include in an address representation.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ContextStyle
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAddressRepresentations/ContextStyle] to configure the degree of disambiguation context to include in an address representation from [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAddressRepresentations], such as including the region name with the city.

## Creating a context style

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a context style with the raw value you provide.

## Available context styles

- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.automatic**: The value that represents the automatic context style.
- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.short**: The value that represents the short context style.
- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.full**: The value that represents the full context style.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
